title: Decrypting Da Vinci's Vitruvian Man
body: Did Leonardo da Vinci encode esoteric secrets within his legendary works of art? Polymath and entrepreneur Robert Edward Grant explores the encrypted “mirror” scripts of Da Vinci and the proportions of his Vitruvian Man in relation to the physics of the Great Pyramid of Giza. Examining how ancient Greeks believed that drawing the geometry of “squaring the circle” represented human transformation, Grant explores how this elusive process reflects the ultimate evolution of human consciousness.
teaser: Did Leonardo da Vinci encode esoteric secrets within his legendary works of art? Polymath and entrepreneur Robert Edward Grant explores the encrypted “mirror” scripts of Da Vinci and the proportions of his Vitruvian Man in relation to the physics of the Great Pyramid of Giza.

title: The Last Supper Decoded
body: What secrets did Leonardo da Vinci encode within the legendary Last Supper fresco in Milan, Italy? Polymath and entrepreneur Robert Edward Grant delves into the mystery of the priceless wall painting, exploring why best-selling books like “The Da Vinci Code” and “Holy Blood, Holy Grail” are popularizing these lost histories and enigmatic works of Da Vinci. Revealing discoveries he made first-hand within the Great Pyramid of Giza, Grant connects the dots between the Alpha and Omega, Jesus and his disciples, Mary Magdalene, Da Vinci, and ancient Egypt.
teaser: What secrets did Leonardo da Vinci encode within the legendary Last Supper fresco in Milan, Italy? Polymath and entrepreneur Robert Edward Grant delves into the mystery of the priceless wall painting, exploring why best-selling books like “The Da Vinci Code” and “Holy Blood, Holy Grail” are popularizing these lost histories and enigmatic works of Da Vinci.

title: Encoded Symbology of the Ancient World
body: What can we learn when we look at history through the lens of language? Proficient in eight languages, polymath Robert Edward Grant has travelled through many countries researching the geometric and linguistic links between ancient wonders of the world. Uncovering lost secrets of hieroglyphs, Grant explains the meanings encoded within not only our physical history but also within iconic stories of legend. Through the symbology of Egypt, hidden histories of theologies, and the connections between the great pyramids of Giza with Da Vinci in Renaissance era Europe, Grant explores the mysteries of ego death and resurrection myths.
teaser: What can we learn when we look at history through the lens of language? Proficient in eight languages, polymath Robert Edward Grant has travelled through many countries researching the geometric and linguistic links between ancient wonders of the world. Uncovering lost secrets of hieroglyphs, Grant explains the meanings encoded within not only our physical history but also within iconic stories of legend.

title: Universal Language of Math & Music
body: Are mathematics and music inherently linked with human consciousness? Uncovering encoded connections of the Universe by examining relationships between mathematical constants like Fibonacci’s Golden Ratio, Pi, and Phi, polymath Robert Edward Grant examines the mysterious missing links of mathematics and music. From Pythagoras to Leonardo da Vinci and Stephen Hawking, Grant examines what humanity can gain from these legendary thinkers and universal constants.
teaser: Are mathematics and music inherently linked with human consciousness? Uncovering encoded connections of the Universe by examining relationships between mathematical constants like Fibonacci’s Golden Ratio, Pi, and Phi, polymath Robert Edward Grant examines the mysterious missing links of mathematics and music.

title: The Geometry of Consciousness
body: What esoteric secrets did Michelangelo encode within his fresco on the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel within Vatican City in Rome, Italy? Exploring the missing links between the mysteries of music and mathematics, polymath and entrepreneur Robert Edward Grant illuminates “the Universal Language of Consciousness” in relation to philosophers and philomaths throughout the ages. Analyzing works from Ancient Greeks like Plato to modern unsolved math problems such as the Riemann Hypothesis, Grant exposes the inherent musical intervals of sacred geometry.
teaser: What esoteric secrets did Michelangelo encode within his fresco on the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel within Vatican City in Rome, Italy? Exploring the missing links between the mysteries of music and mathematics, polymath Robert Edward Grant illuminates “the Universal Language of Consciousness” in relation to philosophers and philomaths throughout the ages.

title: Alchemical Patterns Within Shakespeare & Giza
body: What mathematical mysteries did William Shakespeare encrypt within his legendary sonnets? Exploring the works of the Bard, polymath Robert Edward Grant deciphers the encoded alchemical knowledge connecting the European Renaissance with ancient Egypt. Illuminating the work of Alan W. Green, Grant shares how the divine proportions and mathematical constants of the Great Pyramid of Giza are revealed within Shakespeare’s masterpiece.
teaser: What mathematical mysteries did William Shakespeare encrypt within his legendary sonnets? Exploring the works of the Bard, polymath Robert Edward Grant deciphers the encoded alchemical knowledge connecting the European Renaissance with ancient Egypt.

title: Hidden Layers of Salvator Mundi
body: How are the Great Sphinx and the constellation of Leo related to the Salvator Mundi painting of Leonardo da Vinci? Revealing lost links between the Knights Templar and renaissance art, polymath Robert Edward Grant illuminates hidden history and deciphers encryptions embedded throughout the world to share forgotten truths that can help humanity. Discover the mathematical bonds between Giza and alchemical myths as Grant explores how we can combine astrology and timeless wisdom to better our daily lives.
teaser: How are the Great Sphinx and the constellation of Leo related to the Salvator Mundi painting of Leonardo da Vinci? Revealing lost links between the Knights Templar and renaissance art, polymath Robert Edward Grant illuminates hidden history and deciphers encryptions embedded throughout the world to share forgotten truths that can help humanity.

title: The Philosopher's Stone & Ringsel Crystals
body: Are ringsel crystals found in the ashes of Buddhist masters evidence of the Philosopher's Stone? Polymath Robert Edward Grant explores centuries of myths and elusive legends of the Chintamani, sought by ancient alchemists for its supposed limitless, magical powers. According to Grant, the Philosopher’s Stone is more achievable than we imagine, and by connecting our hearts and minds, we can transmute polarity into unity consciousness.
teaser: Are ringsel crystals found in the ashes of Buddhist masters evidence of the Philosopher's Stone? Polymath Robert Edward Grant explores elusive legends of the Chintamani, sought by ancient alchemists for its supposed limitless, magical powers.

title: Transcending the Mind-Matrix Illusion
body: How does our DNA reveal the geometry within our biology and relate to the Age of Aquarius? Polymath Robert Edward Grant explores esoteric secrets and lost links of transcendental irrational numbers, also known as “infinite values,” and the geometry connecting us with the stars. Sharing his research into the hidden divine, Grant exposes consistent connections throughout science and spirituality that expose harmonic threads of our universe.
teaser: How does our DNA reveal the geometry within our biology and relate to the Age of Aquarius? Polymath Robert Edward Grant explores esoteric secrets of transcendental irrational numbers, also known as “infinite values,” and the geometry connecting us with the stars.
